price: 10 Supporte patiemment leurs paroles et éloigne-toi d’eux dignement.
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرٗا جَمِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-uh'jur'hum hajran jamīlan
